description: Physical activity monitoring with 3 IMUs (hand, chest, ankle) and heart rate. 9 subjects performing 18 activities including walking, running, cycling, and household tasks.

channels.name: heart_rate
channels.description: Heart rate from chest monitor

channels.name: hand_temp
channels.description: Temperature from wrist-mounted IMU

channels.name: hand_acc16_x
channels.description: Acceleration x-axis (±16g scale) from wrist-mounted IMU

channels.description: Acceleration z-axis (±6g scale) from wrist-mounted IMU

channels.description: Angular velocity z-axis from wrist-mounted IMU
